tool_description: Privacy-focused web search using DuckDuckGo with no tracking or user profiling

available_commands.description: Search the web for information using DuckDuckGo
Reset pagination tracking for a query or all queries

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: Specific query to reset, or omit to reset all

tool_usage_guidance: Use duckduckgo for privacy-focused web searches without tracking
Search queries should be concise (1-6 words for best results)
Each result is from a different domain for source diversity
Same query returns different results on subsequent calls (pagination)
No API key required - always available
Best for current events, news, recent developments, and factual lookups
Do not use for personal memory or experience-related queries
Use reset command to restart pagination for a specific query
proactive_triggers: When user asks about current events or recent news
When information might have changed since knowledge cutoff
When user asks 'what's the latest' or 'recent updates'
When factual verification of current information is needed
When user expresses privacy concerns about search
When user wants diverse sources from different domains

metadata.notes: Privacy-focused search engine. No API key required. Uses HTML scraping. Each result from a different domain for diversity. Automatic pagination provides different results on subsequent searches.
